parameters.param:
#!/bin/bash # # generates an 8 bit color table (256 colors) for reference, # using the ANSI CSI+SGR \033[48;5;${val}m for background and # \033[38;5;${val}m for text (see "ANSI Code" on Wikipedia) # echo -en "
 + " for i in {0..35}; do printf "%2b " $i done printf "

 %3b " 0 for i in {0..15}; do echo -en "\033[48;5;${i}m \033[m " done #for i in 16 52 88 124 160 196 232; do for i in {0..6}; do let "i = i*36 +16" printf "

 %3b " $i for j in {0..35}; do let "val = i+j" echo -en "\033[48;5;${val}m \033[m " done done echo -e "
"
